overview: Paul is a frustrated but like able Casting Director who has dreams of finally making his own feature film. His girlfriend Chloe has broken up with him and he is frustrated in his job, although he has great colleagues at the agency in Reuben and Janet. He lives in a flat with his friend, the 'gay' computer nerd Nic. To get his life on track again and win back his girlfriend he decides to make a film about his job, love life and all the funny things that happen behind the scenes at the casting agency.
title: Casting Me...
